1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.5: The sons of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, Thubal, Mosoch, Thiras.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.6: And the sons of Gomer: Ascenez, and Riphath, and Thogorma.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.7: And the sons of Javan: Elisa and Tharsis, Cethim and Dodanim.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.8: The sons of Cham: Chus, and Mesrai, and Phut, and Chaanan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.9: And the sons of Chus: Saba, and Hevila, Sabatha, and Regma, and Sabathaca. And the sons of Regma: Saba, and Dadan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.10: Now Chus begot Nemrod: he began to be mighty upon earth.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.11: But Mesraim begot Ludim, and Anamim, and Laabim, and Nephtuim,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.12: Phetrusim also, and Casluim: from whom came the Philistines, and Caphtorim.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.13: And Chanaan beget Sidon his firstborn, and the Hethite,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.14: And the Jebusite, and the Amorrhite, and the Gergesite,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.15: And the Hevite, and the Aracite, and the Sinite,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.16: And the Aradian, and the Samarite, and the Hamathite.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.17: The sons of Sem: Elam and Asur, and Arphaxad, and Lud, and Aram, and Hus, and Hul, and Gether, and Mosoch.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.18: And Arphaxad beget Sale, and Sale beget Heber.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.19: And to Heber were born two sons, the name of the one was Phaleg, because In his days the earth was divided; and the name of his brother was Jectan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.20: And Jectan beget Elmodad, and Saleph, and Asarmoth, and Jare,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.21: And Adoram, and Usal, and Decla,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.22: And Hebal, and Abimael, and Saba,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.23: And Ophir, and Hevila, and Jobab. All these are the sons of Jectan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.28: And the sons of Abraham, Isaac and Ismahel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.29: And these are the generations of them. The firstborn of Ismahel, Nabajoth, then Cedar, and Adbeel, and Mabsam,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.30: And Masma, and Duma, Massa, Hadad, and Thema,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.31: Jetur, Naphis, Cedma: these are the sons of Ismahel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.32:
And the sons of Cetura, Abraham's<u>
              concubine
             </u>, whom she bore: Zamran, Jecsan, Madan, Madian, Jesboc, and Sue. And the sons of Jecsan, Saba, and Dadan. And the sons of Dadan: Assurim, and Latussim, and Laomin.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.33: And the sons of Madian: Epha, and Epher, and Henoch, and Abida, and Eldaa. All these are the sons of Cetura.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.34: And Abraham beget Isaac: and his sons were Esau and Israel.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.35: The sons of Esau: Eliphaz, Rahuel, Jehus, Ihelom, and Core.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.36: The sons of Eliphaz: Theman, Omar, Sephi, Gathan, Cenez, and by Thamna, Amalec.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.37: The sons of Rahuel: Nahath, Zara, Samma, Meza.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.38: The sons of Seir: Lotan. Sobal, Sebeen, Ana, Dison, Eser, Disan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.39: The sons of Lotan: Hori, Homam. And the sister of Lotan was Thamna.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.40: The sons of Sobal: Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Sephi and Onam. The sons of Sebeon: Aia, and Ana. The son of Ana: Dison.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.41: The sons of Dison: Hamram, and Eseban, and Jethran, and Charan.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.42: The sons of Eser: Balaan, and Zavan, and Jacan. The sons of Disan: Hus and Aran.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.43: Now these are the kings that reigned in the land of Edom, before there was a king over the children of Israel: Bale the son of Beer: and the name of his city was Denaba.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.44: And Bale died, and Jobab the son of Zare of Bosra, reigned in his stead.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.45: And when Jobab also was dead, Husam of the land of the Themanites reigned in his stead.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.46: And Husam also died, and Adad the son of Badad reigned in his stead, and he defeated the Madianites in the land of Moab: and the name of his city was Avith.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.47: And when Adad also was dead, Semla of Masreca reigned in his stead.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.48: Semla also died, and Saul of Rohoboth, which is near the river, reigned in his stead.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.49: And when Saul was dead, Balanan the son of Achobor reigned in his stead.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.50: He also died, and Adad reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Phau, and his wife was called Meetabel the daughter of Matred, the daughter of Mezaab.
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.51: And after the death of Adad, there began to be dukes in Edom instead of kings: duke Thamna, duke Alva, duke Jetheth,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.52: Duke Oolibama, duke Ela, duke Phinon,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.53: Duke Cenez, duke Theman, duke Mabsar,
1 Chronicles or 1 Paralipomenon__01.54: Duke Magdiel, duke Hiram. These are the dukes of Edom.
